mapper.insert: insert into mer_send_sms_pwd_request (service, sign_type, sign, charset, mer_Id, version, user_id, order_id, identity_code, request_url, request_data, request_time, status) values (#{service}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{charset}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{userId}, #{orderId}, #{identityCode}, #{requestUrl}, #{requestData}, #{requestTime}, #{status})
mapper.update: update mer_send_sms_pwd_request set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into mer_send_sms_pwd_response (request_id, sign_type, sign, mer_Id, version, ret_code, ret_msg, response_data, response_time) values (#{requestId}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{responseData}, #{responseTime})
